alert.note: Alert for Mayaguez and Vicinity (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 17 at 7:25AM ADT until June 18 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A watch is in effect through Sunday afternoon due to possible excessive heat index values reaching or exceeding 112 degrees Fahrenheits each afternoon. A warning is in effect due to excessive heat reaching or exceeding 112 degrees this afternoon. * WHERE...For the lower elevations of Puerto Rico from western Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will create dangerous situations in which heat related illnesses are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ample sunshine will amplify the effects of the high temperatures.
info.instruction: An Excessive Heat Watch means that a prolonged period of hot temperatures is expected. The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a DANGEROUS SITUATION in which heat illnesses are possible. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
